Package com.android.sunuerico.newsapp.Helpers

Class FragmentHelper

java.lang.Object
com.android.sunuerico.newsapp.Helpers.FragmentHelper
public class FragmentHelper extends Object
FragmentHelper class is a helper class that contains methods that are used in the fragments

  • Method Details

    • getTopHeadlines

      public static String getTopHeadlines(UserPreference userPreference)
      This method checks if the device is connected to the internet
      Parameters:
      userPreference - the user preference object
      Returns:
      true if the device is connected to the internet, false otherwise

    • getGeneralNewsPerUserQuery

      public static String getGeneralNewsPerUserQuery(String userQuery, UserPreference userPreference)
      This method is called to generate the correct url string when user provides a search query and user preference
      Parameters:
      userQuery - query submitted by user from search widget
      userPreference - user preference in Settings
      Returns:
      url string as per user query

    • getSectionTopHeadlines

      public static String getSectionTopHeadlines(String section, UserPreference userPreference)
      This method is called to get the url string to show top headlines for section as per user preference
      Parameters:
      section - section name according to fragments
      userPreference - user preference from Settings
      Returns:
      url string for provided section as per user preference

    • getSectionSearchQueryNews

      public static String getSectionSearchQueryNews(String section, String userQuery, UserPreference userPreference)
      This method is called to get the url string to show news for user query query for section as per user preference
      Parameters:
      section - section name according to fragments
      userQuery - query input by user
      userPreference - user preference from Settings
      Returns:
      url string for provided section as per user preference

    • isNetworkAvailable

      public static boolean isNetworkAvailable(android.content.Context context)
      This method is called to check network is available or not
      Parameters:
      context - context of the app
      Returns:
      If network is available method returns TRUE otherwise false

    • getUserPreference

      public static UserPreference getUserPreference(android.content.Context context)
      This method is used to get the user preference from Settings
      Parameters:
      context - context of the app
      Returns:
      UserPreference object containing all the preferences selected by user in Settings
